# accuknox_kubearmor_node (Data Source)

This data source provides a mechanism to view the kubearmor node information.

## Example Usage

```
data "accuknox_kubearmor_node" "k_node" {}

output "k_node" {
  value = data.accuknox_kubearmor_node.k_node.node_data
}
```
